message: I know that for a lot of people there's been some confusion about the nifty scrollbar functionality. Personally, I love it, and anybody who doesn't just needs to get used to it. :p
However, there is a problem if you ScrollUp/ScrollDown the broser scrolls the amount of the page height, not the amount of (chatWindow - header) amount.

I'm not sure if that makes complete sense, but in essence, if I hit the scroll down button I expect to see the last few sentences that *were* at the bottom to be at the top, but what ends up happening is that if I scroll down I end up skipping 2-3 "chats".
Using Firefox.  The scroll is incomplete in your feedback group.
Using IE 8: Cannot cut and paste comments from one group to another.
ugh... I was sleepy when I wrote this. I keep using "scroll" and "page" interchangeably, making it really hard to understand. Here's a corrected version. :p

However, there is a problem if you PageUp/PageDown. The broser scrolls the amount of the page height, not the amount of (chatWindow - header) amount.

I'm not sure if that makes complete sense, but in essence, if I hit the PageDown button I expect to see the last few sentences that *were* at the bottom to be at the top, but what ends up happening is that if I page down I end up skipping 2-3 messages, because the window has scrolled too far.
